job description:
Data Scientist
Newark, DE
$54-56/hour
Data Scientist is responsible for designing, utilizing and improve information systems to appropriately respond to information requests.
Data Scientist Responsibilities:
  • Providing experimental design guidance, statistical analyses, and reports to scientists to generate and extract the most relevant information for their investment.
  • Adapting or developing experimental design and data analysis methods and tools to solve problems for clients in biology, chemistry, environmental fate or product development fields.
  • Design, coding and maintenance of statistical macros and applications for regularly needed analyses and visualizations.
  • Engaging with cross-functional and globally-based teams to provide statistical and data science competencies.
Data Scientist Qualifications:
  • Expertise in statistical programming such as R or SAS
  • Masters in Statistics or related discipline
  • A track record of adapting existing statistical analysis methods or developing new analysis methods to address unique technical problems.
  • Experience in applied statistical methods with expertise in mixed models, generalized linear mixed models and experimental design.
  • Experience applying statistical methods to biology, agriculture, or R&D environments is preferred.
